item.description:
Â 

On September 24th we will begin our fall session for the progressive Line Dance class. If you or anyone you know has ever wanted to learn to Line Dance this is THE PLACE and TIME. From the very easy steps and dances to some more difficult steps and dances. Taking our time as we learn. This will be a 10-12 week session being held on Monday evenings. Plenty of parking in a safe, well lighted area. Bring a friend and check us out.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Begin Our Fall Line Dance For Beginner Session
